meanings.sent1: The cake was made up of different stratas of sponge and cream.
meanings.sent2: The stratas of clouds in the sky created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent3: The archaeologists were excited to uncover the ancient stratas of the city.
meanings.sent4: The stratas of knowledge in the book were deep and insightful.
meanings.sent5: The geological map showed the various stratas of rock beneath the surface.

meanings.definition: A layer of material, especially rock or soil
meanings.sent1: The excavation revealed a rich stratas of soil dating back centuries.
meanings.sent2: The miners dug through the stratas of rock to reach the precious minerals.
meanings.sent3: The gardeners carefully tended to each stratas of soil to ensure healthy plants.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted the intricate stratas of rock with great detail.
meanings.sent5: The construction workers studied the different stratas of soil before building the foundation.

meanings.definition: A social class or group within a society
meanings.sent1: The upper stratas of society enjoyed lavish parties and exclusive events.
meanings.sent2: The stratas of society often determine access to resources and opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show humorously portrayed the different stratas of society interacting.
meanings.sent4: The novel explored the hidden struggles within the upper stratas of society.
meanings.sent5: The documentary highlighted the disparities between the various stratas of society.
